org.apache.streams.gplus.serializer.util

Class GooglePlusActivityUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.streams.gplus.serializer.util.GooglePlusActivityUtil

  • public class GooglePlusActivityUtil
extends Object
    GooglePlusActivityUtil helps convert c.g.Person and c.g.Activity into o.a.s.p.j.o.Page and o.a.s.p.j.Activity.

      • formatId

        public static String formatId(String... idparts)
        Formats the ID to conform with the Apache Streams activity ID convention
        Parameters:
        idparts - the parts of the ID to join
        Returns:
        a valid Activity ID in format "id:googleplus:part1:part2:...partN"
